/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Cars and buses, painted in vibrant hues of red and blue, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
